mapper.insert: insert into TB_GROUP_MS( grp_id, udn, is_sub_call) values( #{grpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSubCall,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: delete from TB_GROUP_MS where grp_id = #{grpId} and udn = #{udn}
mapper.select: select gm.GRP_ID, grp.GRP_NAME, gm.UDN, gm.IS_SUB_CALL, grp.PGRP_ID from TB_GROUP_MS gm inner join TB_GROUP_INFO grp on grp.GRP_ID=gm.GRP_ID where gm.UDN = #{udn}

select gm.GRP_ID grpId, gm.UDN udn, u.USER_NAME userName, m.ONLINE_STATUS onlineStatus from TB_GROUP_MS gm inner join TB_USER u on gm.UDN=u.UDN inner join TB_MS_INFO m on m.UDN=gm.UDN where gm.GRP_ID = #{grpId} and gm.UDN != #{udn}
